text:
what can you do
I'm Claude, an AI assistant created by Anthropic. I aim to be direct and honest about my capabilities. I can help with:

- Writing and editing
- Analysis and research
- Math and coding
- Answering questions across many fields
- Problem-solving and brainstorming
- Translation and language help

I aim to be truthful, admit when I'm uncertain, and stay within ethical bounds. I won't engage in hate speech, fraud, or anything illegal. I also try to be upfront about limitations - I can't access the internet, make calls, or manipulate files/images outside our conversation.

What would you like help with?
